title: Switch officer contact to WhatsApp Calling only (remove SMS and device tel links)

requirements.text: Remove all SMS contact actions from the UI and interaction logic, so the app no longer offers any "Send SMS" behavior anywhere.

quotes: CALL THE OFFICER THROUGH WHATAPP CALLING DONT USE SMS AND CALL BY USING LINK DEVICE

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/messaging/OfficerMessageComposer.tsx`, the "Send SMS from This Device" button is removed and no SMS error state can be triggered.
In `frontend/src/components/officers/OfficerList.tsx`, the "Send SMS from This Device" dropdown action is removed.
No user-facing text mentions SMS as a supported contact option in the affected components.

requirements.text: Remove all device-based calling via `tel:` links from the UI and ensure officer calling is offered only as a WhatsApp Calling handoff (open WhatsApp, then instruct the user to start the voice call inside WhatsApp).

quotes: CALL THE OFFICER THROUGH WHATAPP CALLING DONT USE SMS AND CALL BY USING LINK DEVICE

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/messaging/OfficerMessageComposer.tsx`, the `tel:` call button/link is removed.
In `frontend/src/components/officers/OfficerList.tsx`, the `tel:` call action is removed from the actions dropdown.
The Officers list continues to provide a WhatsApp call option that opens WhatsApp and shows English guidance that the user must start the voice call from within WhatsApp.
No UI element implies the web app can place a phone call directly from the browser/device using a link.

requirements.text: Update the Dashboard Officer Messaging card to present WhatsApp Calling as the primary calling option, while keeping a copy-to-clipboard workflow for the composed alert payload.

quotes: CALL THE OFFICER THROUGH WHATAPP CALLING DONT USE SMS AND CALL BY USING LINK DEVICE

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/messaging/OfficerMessageComposer.tsx`, provide a clear WhatsApp call handoff action (separate from chat if both are kept) that opens WhatsApp for the selected officer and displays English guidance to start the call inside WhatsApp.
The message text remains copyable via the existing copy action.
The informational/help text in the card is updated to describe only WhatsApp chat/call handoff and copying the message (no SMS or `tel:` references).

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other paths listed in `SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths`.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Implementing a direct WhatsApp voice-call deep link (WhatsApp calling must be a handoff flow).
Sending SMS from the web app or re-adding any `sms:` deep links.
Placing calls via `tel:` links or any other device dialing link.
